StringTable.Label: ColonizersAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Seus navios colônia reembolsam seu Administrador ao colonizar um novo mundo.

StringTable.Label: DevoutAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Começa com um Clérigo, acesso às tecnologias Jihad e Caminho. A cultura cresce cada vez que eles aumentam a sua ideologia.

StringTable.Label: EngineersAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: A produção de navios e asteróides decai pela metade da taxa normal.

StringTable.Label: XenophobicAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: A pesquisa e a construção social triplicaram, a construção militar caiu pela metade e a capacidade de construir a realização do Conclave dos Sonhos.

StringTable.Label: TimeTravelersAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Viajou de volta a esta época do futuro, Grande tecnologia, sem infra-estrutura. Acesso às tecnologias Dimensional Fazing.

StringTable.Label: HeroicAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Começa com a tecnologia da Escola Superior de Guerra, bônus para as legiões que defendem os planetas.

StringTable.Label: ZealotsAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Ganhe acesso às Tecnologias Esclavagistas e ganhe pontos adicionais de Ideologia cada vez que você Conquista um mundo.

StringTable.Label: UnrelentingAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: As invasões nunca custam créditos. Os planetas geram +1 mais influência por turno.

StringTable.Label: AncientAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Obtém pesquisas a partir de artefatos precursores e anomalias. Recebe acesso à Tecnologia Xeno Mysticism.

StringTable.Label: UnwaveringAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: As colônias são muito mais difíceis de serem viradas para a Cultura e o acesso às tecnologias do Espírito Inquebrável.

StringTable.Label: EntrepreneursAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Starts with freighter, access to special trade related improvements, access to Acquisition and Marketing technologies receives 5 additional trade licenses.

StringTable.Label: WealthyAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Começa com mais 1000 créditos. Os planetas começam com um ponto de produção extra.

StringTable.Label: PatrioticAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Começa o jogo com 10 pontos adicionais de Administrador e acesso às tecnologias de coordenação.

StringTable.Label: ProlificAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Planets start with 50% more population than is brought on the Colony ship. Population grows much faster.

StringTable.Label: AdaptableAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Starts with Extreme World Colonization technology and access to the Precursor Archive achievement.

StringTable.Label: AngryAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: They're just very angry. Start with a military vessel.

StringTable.Label: DiplomaticAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Can build the Galactic Council and starts with diplomatic bonus with all races.

StringTable.Label: ConquerorAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Legions start at twice as good as anyone else's. Receives 2,500bc upon conquering a planet.

StringTable.Label: HopefulAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Believes any civilization capable of space travel must be a potential friend. Higher morale on planets.

StringTable.Label: CertainAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Believes their philosophy should be universal, increased (+2) influence, special planet improvements. Planets receive 100 research every time an ideological trait is unlocked.

StringTable.Label: StarfaringAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Ships immune to nebula and has access to special Hyperion improvements.

StringTable.Label: ParanoidAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Free drones defend planets, shipyards and Starbases, and access to the Molecular Fabrication technologies.

StringTable.Label: IntuitiveAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Starts with free Research, and access to Xeno Anthropology technologies.

StringTable.Label: KnowledgeableAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Starts knowing the location of other homeworlds, and access to the Gravitonic tree.

StringTable.Label: CyberneticAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Gives Access to more powerful technologies and Improvements for races who are not afraid to interface with superior technologies.

StringTable.Label: InventiveAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Starts with an Engineering citizen type, Constructor ship.

StringTable.Label: WarriorsAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Ignore 10% of all damage done to their ships. All weapons have 10% longer range.

StringTable.Label: VigilantAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Starbases have larger Areas of Effect. Enemy ships are slowed, and player ships gain an attack bonus, while in the area of any starbase.

StringTable.Label: AeroponicsAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: A tradition of growing plants without soil enables Aeroponic Farms on any terrain with the Xeno Adaptation Technology.

StringTable.Label: SurveyStartingShip_Dec
StringTable.String: Begin with a Survey Ship that explores the galaxy and investigates valuable Anomalies.

StringTable.Label: ColonyStartingShip_Dec
StringTable.String: Begin with a Colony Ship that quickly begins the search for new worlds.

StringTable.Label: ConstructorsStartingShip_Dec
StringTable.String: Start with two Constructors that start to quickly tap the galactic resources.

StringTable.Label: ScoutsStartingShip_Dec
StringTable.String: Start with three tiny Scout Ships that quickly explore the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: FuryStartingShip_Dec
StringTable.String: Starts with two Small Warships armed with experimental weapons and defense systems.
